00054 
00055 int i;
00056 
00057 int front = -1;
00058 int rear = -1;
00059 pthread_mutex_t mutex_on_TSB = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;

00061 
00062 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00063 /* FUNCTION  time_align():                                                      */
00064 /* It searches for the correct TSB[index] where data frame df is to be          */
00065 /* assigned. If the df has soc and fracsec which is older then soc and fracsec  */
00066 /* of TSB[first] then we discard the data frame                                 */
00067 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00068 
00069 void time_align(struct data_frame *df) {
00070 
00071         int flag = 0;
00072         fprintf(fp_log,"Inside time_align()\n");
00073         pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex_on_TSB);
00074         if(front == -1) { // TSB is used for the first time
00075         
00076                 front = rear = 0;
00077                 assign_df_to_TSB(df,front);     
00078                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex_on_TSB);
00079                 return; 
00080         
00081         } else {
00082 
00083                 unsigned long int df_soc,df_fracsec,tsb_soc,tsb_fracsec;
00084 
00085                 df_soc = to_long_int_convertor(df->soc);
00086                 df_fracsec = to_long_int_convertor(df->fracsec);
00087                 tsb_soc = to_long_int_convertor((unsigned char *)TSB[front].soc);
00088                 tsb_fracsec = to_long_int_convertor((unsigned char *)TSB[front].fracsec);
00089 
00090                 if((df_soc < tsb_soc) || ((df_soc == tsb_soc) && (df_fracsec < tsb_fracsec))) {
00091                         
00092                         fprintf(fp_log,"df_soc %ld tsb_soc %ld df_fracsec %ld tsb_fracsec %ld\n",df_soc,tsb_soc,df_fracsec,tsb_fracsec);
00093                         fprintf(fp_log,"The Data frame is too old\n");
00094                         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex_on_TSB);
00095                         return; 
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 if(rear >= front) {
00099                         for(i = rear; i>= front; i--) {
00100                                         
00101                                 if(!ncmp_cbyc ((unsigned char *)TSB[i].soc,df->soc,4)) {
00102                                         
00103                                         if(!ncmp_cbyc ((unsigned char *)TSB[i].fracsec,df->fracsec,3)) { /* 3 bytes is actual fraction of seconds and 1 
00104                                                                                          byte is Time quality  */ 
00105                                                 flag = 1;
00106                                                 break;
00107                 
00108                                         } 
00109         
00110                                 } else {
00111                                                 
00112                                         continue;
00113                                         
00114                                 } //if for soc ends
00115                         }// for ends                                    
00116                 } else {
00117 
00118                         for(i = rear; i< front; i++) {
00119                                         
00120                                 if(!ncmp_cbyc ((unsigned char *)TSB[i].soc,df->soc,4)) {
00121                                         
00122                                         if(!ncmp_cbyc ((unsigned char *)TSB[i].fracsec,df->fracsec,3)) { /* 3 bytes is actual fraction of seconds and 1 
00123                                                                                          byte is Time quality  */ 
00124                                                 flag = 1;
00125                                                 break;
00126                                         } 
00127         
00128                                 } else {
00129                                                 
00130                                         continue;
00131                                         
00132                                 } //if for soc ends
00133                         }// for ends                                    
00134                 }
00135                  
00136         } // if other than the front = -1
00137 
00138         if(flag) {
00139 
00140                 fprintf(fp_log,"Matched with TSB[%d]\n",i);
00141                 //Assign to existing TSB
00142                 assign_df_to_TSB(df,i);                         
00143 
00144         } else {
00145 
00146                 rear = (rear + 1) % MAXTSB;
00147 
00148                 if(front == rear) { // All TSB are full. Dispatch the TSB[rear] and use it to assign new df
00149                 
00150                         dispatch(rear); 
00151                         front = (front + 1) % MAXTSB;
00152                         assign_df_to_TSB(df,rear);
00153                                 
00154                 } else {
00155 
00156                         assign_df_to_TSB(df,rear);                                      
00157 
00158                 }
00159         }
00160         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex_on_TSB);
00161 }
00162 
00163 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00164 /* FUNCTION  assign_df_to_TSB():                                                */
00165 /* It assigns the arrived data frame df to TSB[index]                           */
00166 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00167 
00168 void assign_df_to_TSB(struct data_frame *df,int index) { 
00169 
00170         fprintf(fp_log,"Inside assign_df_to_TSB()\n");
00171         /* Check if the TSB is used for the first time. If so we need to 
00172            allocate memory to its member variables */
00173         if(TSB[index].soc == NULL) { // 1 if
00174 
00175                 struct  cfg_frame *temp_cfg = cfgfirst;
00176         
00177                 TSB[index].soc = malloc(5);
00178                 TSB[index].fracsec = malloc(5);
00179 
00180                 memset(TSB[index].soc,'\0',5);
00181                 memset(TSB[index].fracsec,'\0',5);
00182                 
00183                 copy_cbyc((unsigned char *)TSB[index].soc,df->soc,4);
00184                 copy_cbyc((unsigned char *)TSB[index].fracsec,df->fracsec,4);
00185                 
00186                 TSB[index].first_data_frame = df; /* Assign df to the 'first_data_frame' in the data frame linked list of TSB[index] */
00187                 
00188                 /* Now we need to store the pmu/pdc id in the pmupdc_id_list that would be required while sorting */
00189                 struct pmupdc_id_list *temp_pmuid;
00190                 while(temp_cfg != NULL) {
00191                 
00192                         /* Create a node of the type 'pmupdc_id_list' and copy the pmu/pde id from the cfg to it */
00193                         struct pmupdc_id_list *pmuid = malloc(sizeof(struct pmupdc_id_list));
00194                         pmuid->idcode = malloc(3);
00195                         memset(pmuid->idcode,'\0',3);
00196                         copy_cbyc((unsigned char *)pmuid->idcode,temp_cfg->idcode,2);
00197                         pmuid->num_pmu = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->num_pmu);
00198                         pmuid->nextid = NULL;
00199 
00200                         if(TSB[index].idlist == NULL) { /* Assign the pmuid to the idlist as it is the first id in the list */
00201 
00202                                 TSB[index].idlist = temp_pmuid = pmuid;
00203 
00204                         } else {
00205 
00206                                 temp_pmuid->nextid = pmuid;
00207                                 temp_pmuid = pmuid;
00208 
00209                         }                       
00210                       
00211                         temp_cfg = temp_cfg->cfgnext;                           
00212                 } // while ends . A pmu/pdc id list is created for the TSB[index]
00213 
00214         } else { // 1 if else 
00215 
00216                 struct  cfg_frame *temp_cfg = cfgfirst;
00217                 if(TSB[index].first_data_frame == NULL) { // 2 if 
00218 
00219                      /* After TSB[index] is cleared this is the first data frame for it. 
00220                         The memory for the member variables of TSB[index] has already 
00221                         been allocated. Hence after dispatch() and clear_TSB() operation
00222                         this TSB is to be assigned the data_frame for the first time. */
00223                         
00224                         copy_cbyc((unsigned char *)TSB[index].soc,df->soc,4);
00225                         copy_cbyc((unsigned char *)TSB[index].fracsec,df->fracsec,4);
00226                         
00227                         TSB[index].first_data_frame = df;     /* Assign df to the 'first_data_frame' in the data frame linked list of 
00228                                                                  TSB[index] */
00229                 
00230                      /* Now we need to store the pmu/pdc id in the pmupdc_id_list 
00231                         that would be required while sorting */
00232                         struct pmupdc_id_list *temp_pmuid;
00233                         while(temp_cfg != NULL) {
00234                         
00235                              /* Create a node of the type 'pmupdc_id_list' and 
00236                                 copy the pmu/pde id from the cfg to it */
00237 
00238                                 struct pmupdc_id_list *pmuid = malloc(sizeof(struct pmupdc_id_list));
00239                                 pmuid->idcode = malloc(3);
00240                                 memset(pmuid->idcode,'\0',3);
00241                                 copy_cbyc((unsigned char *)pmuid->idcode,temp_cfg->idcode,2);
00242                                 pmuid->num_pmu = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->num_pmu);    
00243                                 pmuid->nextid = NULL;
00244         
00245                                 if(TSB[index].idlist == NULL) { /* Assign the pmuid to the idlist as it is the first id in the list */
00246                                 
00247                                         TSB[index].idlist = temp_pmuid = pmuid;
00248         
00249                                 } else {
00250 
00251                                         temp_pmuid->nextid = pmuid;
00252                                         temp_pmuid = pmuid;
00253         
00254                                 }                       
00255                               
00256                                 temp_cfg = temp_cfg->cfgnext;                           
00257                         } // while ends
00258                 
00259                 } else { // 2 if else
00260         
00261                         /* Traverse the data frames of TSB[index] and assign the df to 'dnext' of 
00262                         the last element in the data frame LL.*/
00263                         struct data_frame *temp_df,*check_df;
00264 
00265                         /* Need to check if df with same idcode and soc is already assigned to 
00266                            the TSB[index] */
00267                         check_df = TSB[index].first_data_frame;
00268                         while(check_df != NULL) {
00269                                         
00270                                 if(!ncmp_cbyc(check_df->idcode,df->idcode,2)) {
00271                                 
00272                                         fprintf(fp_log,"Data frame already inside TSB[%d]\n",index);
00273                                         free_dataframe_object(df);
00274                                         return;                                 
00275                 
00276                                 } else {
00277 
00278                                         check_df = check_df->dnext;
00279         
00280                                 }                                                       
00281                         }
00282                 
00283                         temp_df = TSB[index].first_data_frame;
00284                         while(temp_df->dnext != NULL) {
00285                         
00286                                 temp_df = temp_df->dnext;                       
00287                 
00288                         }
00289                         
00290                         temp_df->dnext = df;     
00291                 } // 2 if ends  
00292                 
00293         } // 1 if ends
00294 } 
00295 
00296 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00297 /* FUNCTION  dispatch():                                                        */
00298 /* It dispatches the combined data frame to all the destination devices         */
00299 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00300 
00301 void dispatch(int index) {
00302 
00303         int size,flag = 0;
00304         fprintf(fp_log,"Inside dispatch()\n");
00305         sort_data_inside_TSB(index);
00306         dataframe = NULL;        
00307         pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex_Upper_Layer_Details);
00308         struct Upper_Layer_Details *temp_pdc = ULfirst;
00309 
00310         while(temp_pdc != NULL ) {
00311 
00312                 if((temp_pdc->UL_upper_pdc_cfgsent == 1) && (temp_pdc->UL_data_transmission_off == 0)) {                        
00313 
00314                         if(flag == 0) {
00315 
00316                                 size = create_dataframe(index); 
00317                                 flag = 1;
00318                         }
00319 
00320                         if(temp_pdc->config_change == 1) {
00321                 
00322                                 dataframe[14] = 0x04;
00323                                 dataframe[15] = 0x00;
00324                                 
00325                         } else {
00326 
00327                                 dataframe[14] = 0x00;
00328                                 dataframe[15] = 0x00;
00329 
00330                         }
00331 
00332                         if(temp_pdc->port == UDPPORT) {
00333                                 
00334                                 if (sendto(temp_pdc->sockfd,dataframe, size, 0,
00335                                                 (struct sockaddr *)&temp_pdc->pdc_addr,sizeof(temp_pdc->pdc_addr)) == -1)
00336                                             perror("sendto");   
00337                                 else        fprintf(fp_log,"\nDispatched toUPDC ");                                     
00338 
00339         
00340                         } else if(temp_pdc->port == TCPPORT) {
00341 
00342                                  if(send(temp_pdc->sockfd,dataframe,size, 0)== -1)
00343                                             perror("send");                     
00344                         }                       
00345                 }
00346                 temp_pdc = temp_pdc->next;
00347         }
00348         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex_Upper_Layer_Details);
00349         if(dataframe != NULL)   free(dataframe);
00350 
00351         clear_TSB(index);
00352 }
00353 
00354 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00355 /* FUNCTION  sort_data_inside_TSB():                                            */
00356 /* This function sorts the data frames in the TSB[index] in the order of the    */
00357 /* Idcodes present in the 'struct pmupdc_id_list list' of the TSB[index]        */
00358 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00359 
00360 void sort_data_inside_TSB(int index) { 
00361 
00362         fprintf(fp_log,"sort_data_inside_TSB()\n");
00363         struct pmupdc_id_list *temp_list;
00364         struct data_frame *prev_df,*curr_df,*sorted_df,*r_df,*s_df,*last_df,*p_df;
00365         int match = 0;
00366         unsigned int id_check;
00367  
00368         /* Pointer track_df will hold the address of the last sorted data_frame object. 
00369         Thus we assign to the 'track_df->dnext ' the next sorted data_frame  object and so on */
00370 
00371         temp_list = TSB[index].idlist; /* Starting ID required for sorting */
00372         last_df = TSB[index].first_data_frame;
00373         p_df = TSB[index].first_data_frame;
00374 
00375         curr_df = last_df;
00376         sorted_df = prev_df = NULL;
00377 
00378         while(temp_list != NULL) { // 1 while
00379 
00380                                 match = 0;
00381                                 while(curr_df != NULL) { // 2. Traverse the pmu id in TSB and sort 
00382                 
00383                                         if(!ncmp_cbyc(curr_df->idcode,(unsigned char *)temp_list->idcode,2)){
00384 
00385                                                 match = 1;
00386                                                 break;
00387 
00388                                         } else {
00389 
00390                                                 prev_df = curr_df; 
00391                                                 curr_df = curr_df->dnext;                                               
00392 
00393                                         }
00394                                 
00395                                 } // 2 while ends       
00396                                 
00397                                 if (match == 1) {
00398 
00399                                         if(prev_df == NULL) {
00400 
00401                                                 r_df = curr_df;
00402                                                 s_df = curr_df->dnext;
00403                                                 if(sorted_df == NULL) {
00404 
00405                                                         sorted_df = r_df;
00406                                                         TSB[index].first_data_frame = sorted_df;
00407                                                 } else {
00408 
00409                                                         sorted_df->dnext = r_df;
00410                                                         sorted_df = r_df;
00411                                                 }
00412                                                 sorted_df->dnext = s_df ;
00413                                                 curr_df = last_df = s_df;
00414 
00415                                         } else {
00416 
00417                                                 if(sorted_df == NULL) {
00418 
00419                                                                 r_df = curr_df;
00420                                                                 s_df = r_df->dnext;
00421                                                                 prev_df->dnext = s_df;
00422                                                                 sorted_df = r_df;
00423                                                                 TSB[index].first_data_frame = sorted_df;
00424                                                                 sorted_df->dnext = last_df ;
00425                                                                 curr_df = last_df;
00426                                                                 prev_df = NULL;
00427 
00428                                                 } else {//if(sorted_df != NULL) {
00429 
00430                                                                 r_df = curr_df;
00431                                                                 s_df = r_df->dnext;
00432                                                                 prev_df->dnext = s_df;
00433                                                                 sorted_df->dnext = r_df;
00434                                                                 sorted_df = r_df;
00435                                                                 sorted_df->dnext = last_df ;
00436                                                                 curr_df = last_df;
00437                                                                 prev_df = NULL;
00438                                                 }                                       
00439                                         }                                
00440                                         
00441                                 }  else {  // id whose data frame didnot arrive No match
00442 
00443                                         char *idcode;
00444                                         idcode = malloc(3);
00445 
00446                                         struct data_frame *df = malloc(sizeof(struct data_frame));
00447                                         if(!df) {
00448 
00449                                             fprintf(fp_log,"Not enough memory df\n");
00450                                         }
00451                                         df->dnext = NULL;
00452 
00453 
00454                                         // Allocate memory for df->framesize
00455                                         df->framesize = malloc(3);
00456                                         if(!df->framesize) {
00457 
00458                                              fprintf(fp_log,"Not enough memory df->idcode\n");
00459                                              exit(1);
00460                                         }
00461 
00462                                         // Allocate memory for df->idcode
00463                                         df->idcode = malloc(3);
00464                                         if(!df->idcode) {
00465 
00466                                              fprintf(fp_log,"Not enough memory df->idcode\n");
00467                                              exit(1);
00468                                         }
00469 
00470                                         // Allocate memory for df->soc
00471                                         df->soc = malloc(5);
00472                                         if(!df->soc) {
00473 
00474                                              fprintf(fp_log,"Not enough memory df->soc\n");
00475                                              exit(1);
00476                                         }
00477 
00478                                         // Allocate memory for df->fracsec
00479                                         df->fracsec = malloc(5);
00480                                         if(!df->fracsec) {
00481                                             fprintf(fp_log,"Not enough memory df->fracsec\n");
00482                                             exit(1);
00483                                         }
00484 
00485                                         unsigned int size = (16/* sync,fsize,idcode,soc,fracsec,checksum */ + (temp_list->num_pmu)*2)*sizeof(unsigned char);
00486                                         
00487                                         df->num_pmu = temp_list->num_pmu ;
00488                                         //Copy FRAMESIZE
00489                                         int_to_ascii_convertor(size,df->framesize);
00490                                         df->framesize[2] = '\0';
00491                                                                                 
00492                                         //Copy IDCODE                   
00493                                         copy_cbyc (df->idcode,(unsigned char *)temp_list->idcode,2);
00494                                         df->idcode[2] = '\0';
00495 
00496                                         //Copy SOC                                              
00497                                         copy_cbyc (df->soc,(unsigned char *)TSB[index].soc,4);
00498                                         df->soc[4] = '\0';
00499 
00500                                         //Copy FRACSEC                                          
00501                                         copy_cbyc (df->fracsec,(unsigned char *)TSB[index].fracsec,4);
00502                                         df->fracsec[4] = '\0';
00503 
00504                                         df->dpmu = malloc(temp_list->num_pmu * sizeof(struct data_for_each_pmu *));
00505                                         if(!df->dpmu) {
00506                                              fprintf(fp_log,"Not enough memory df->dpmu[][]\n");
00507                                              exit(1);
00508                                         }
00509 
00510                                         for (i = 0; i < temp_list->num_pmu; i++) {
00511                                               df->dpmu[i] = malloc(sizeof(struct data_for_each_pmu));
00512                                         }
00513                                         
00514                                         int j = 0;              
00515                                         // PMU data has not come  
00516                                         while(j < temp_list->num_pmu) {
00517 
00518                                                 df->dpmu[j]->stat = malloc(3);
00519                                                 if(!df->dpmu[j]->stat) {
00520                                                         fprintf(fp_log,"Not enough memory for df->dpmu[j]->stat\n");
00521                                                 }
00522                                                 
00523                                                 df->dpmu[j]->stat[0] = 0x00;
00524                                                 df->dpmu[j]->stat[1] = 0x0F;
00525                                                 df->dpmu[j]->stat[2] = '\0';
00526                                                 j++;
00527                                         }
00528 
00529                                         if(sorted_df == NULL) {
00530 
00531                                                                 r_df = df;
00532                                                                 sorted_df = r_df;
00533                                                                 TSB[index].first_data_frame = sorted_df;
00534                                                                 sorted_df->dnext = last_df ;
00535                                                                 curr_df = last_df;
00536                                                                 prev_df = NULL;
00537                                         } else {
00538                                                                 r_df = df;
00539                                                                 sorted_df->dnext = r_df;
00540                                                                 sorted_df = r_df;
00541                                                                 sorted_df->dnext = last_df ;
00542                                                                 curr_df = last_df;
00543                                                                 prev_df = NULL;
00544                                         }                               
00545                                 }
00546 
00547                         temp_list = temp_list->nextid;  //go for next ID
00548 
00549         } // 1. while ends
00550 
00551         p_df = TSB[index].first_data_frame;
00552         while(p_df != NULL){
00553 
00554                 id_check = to_intconvertor(p_df->idcode);
00555                 p_df = p_df->dnext;
00556         }
00557 } 
00558 
00559 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00560 /* FUNCTION  clear_TSB():                                                       */
00561 /* It clears TSB[index] and frees all data frame objects after the data frames  */
00562 /* in TSB[index] have been dispatched to destination device                     */
00563 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00564 
00565 void clear_TSB(int index) { // 
00566 
00567         fprintf(fp_log,"Inside clear_TSB()\n");
00568         unsigned long int tsb_soc,tsb_fracsec;
00569         tsb_soc = to_long_int_convertor((unsigned char *)TSB[front].soc);
00570         tsb_fracsec = to_long_int_convertor((unsigned char *)TSB[front].fracsec);
00571 
00572         memset(TSB[index].soc,'\0',5);
00573         memset(TSB[index].fracsec,'\0',5);
00574 
00575         struct pmupdc_id_list *t_list,*r_list;
00576         t_list = TSB[index].idlist;
00577 
00578         while(t_list != NULL) {
00579         
00580                 r_list = t_list->nextid;
00581                 free(t_list->idcode);
00582                 free(t_list);
00583                 t_list = r_list;                        
00584         }
00585 
00586         struct data_frame *t,*r;
00587         t = TSB[index].first_data_frame;
00588 
00589         while(t != NULL) {
00590         
00591                 r = t->dnext;
00592                 free_dataframe_object(t);
00593                 t = r;                  
00594         }
00595 
00596         TSB[index].first_data_frame = NULL;
00597         TSB[index].idlist = NULL;
00598 }
00599 
00600 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00601 /* FUNCTION  create_dataframe():                                                */
00602 /* It creates the IEEEC37.118 Standard based combined data frame from the data  */
00603 /* frames received from all the source devices to be sent to destination        */
00604 /* devices                                                                      */
00605 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00606 
00607 int create_dataframe(int index) {
00608 
00609         fprintf(fp_log,"Inside create_dataframe()\n");
00610         int total_frame_size = 0;
00611         unsigned char temp[3];
00612         struct data_frame *temp_df;
00613         unsigned int fsize;
00614         uint16_t chk;
00615 
00616         temp_df = TSB[index].first_data_frame;
00617 
00618         while(temp_df != NULL) {
00619                 
00620                  fsize = to_intconvertor(temp_df->idcode);
00621                  fsize = to_intconvertor(temp_df->framesize);
00622                  total_frame_size = total_frame_size + fsize;
00623                  total_frame_size -= 16; // skip SYNC + FRAMESIZE + idcode + soc + fracsec + checksum
00624                  temp_df = temp_df->dnext;
00625         }               
00626 
00627         total_frame_size = total_frame_size + 18/* SYNC + FRAMESIZE + idcode + soc + fracsec + checksum + outer stat */; 
00628 
00629         dataframe = malloc((total_frame_size + 1)*sizeof(char)); // Allocate memory for data frame
00630         if(!dataframe) {
00631                 
00632                 fprintf(fp_log,"No enough memory for dataframe\n");
00633         }       
00634         dataframe[total_frame_size] = '\0';     
00635 
00636         // Start the data frame creation 
00637         int z = 0;
00638         byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,DATASYNC,z,2); // SYNC
00639         z += 2;
00640 
00641         memset(temp,'\0',3);
00642         int_to_ascii_convertor(total_frame_size,temp);
00643         byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp,z,2); // FRAME SIZE
00644         z += 2;
00645 
00646         memset(temp,'\0',3);
00647         int_to_ascii_convertor(PDC_IDCODE,temp);
00648         byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp,z,2); // PDC ID
00649         z += 2;
00650 
00651         byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,(unsigned char *)TSB[index].soc,z,4); //SOC
00652         z += 4;
00653         byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,(unsigned char *)TSB[index].fracsec,z,4); //FRACSEC
00654         z += 4;
00655 
00656         unsigned char stat[2]; //Outer Stat
00657         stat[0] = 0x00;
00658         stat[1] = 0x00;
00659         byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,stat,z,2); //outer stat
00660         z += 2;
00661 
00662         temp_df = TSB[index].first_data_frame;
00663         while(temp_df != NULL) { // 1
00664 
00665                 int j = 0;
00666                 while(j < temp_df->num_pmu) { // 2
00667 
00668                         if(temp_df->dpmu[j]->stat[1] == 0x0f) {
00669                                 // Copy STAT
00670 
00671                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->stat,z,2); // STAT
00672                                 z += 2;
00673                                 j++;
00674                                 continue;
00675                         }
00676 
00677                         //Copy STAT
00678                         byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->stat,z,2); // STAT
00679 
00680                         z += 2;
00681 
00682                         int i = 0;
00683                         //Copy Phasors
00684                         if(temp_df->dpmu[j]->phnmr != 0) {
00685                                 if(temp_df->dpmu[j]->fmt->phasor == '1') {
00686                                         while(i < temp_df->dpmu[j]->phnmr) {
00687         
00688                                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->phasors[i],z,8); // Phasors
00689                                                 z += 8;
00690                                                 i++;
00691                                         }
00692                                 } else {
00693                                         while(i < temp_df->dpmu[j]->phnmr) {
00694                                 
00695                                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->phasors[i],z,4); // Phasors
00696                                                 z += 4;
00697                                                 i++;
00698                                         }
00699                                 }                       
00700 
00701                         }
00702                         //Copy FREQ
00703                         if(temp_df->dpmu[j]->fmt->freq == '1') {
00704 
00705                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->freq,z,4); // FREQ
00706                                 z += 4;
00707                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->dfreq,z,4); // FREQ
00708                                 z += 4;
00709 
00710                          } else {
00711                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->freq,z,2); // FREQ
00712                                 z += 2;
00713                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->dfreq,z,2); // FREQ
00714                                 z += 2;
00715 
00716                         }                                               
00717         
00718                         // Copy Analogs
00719                         if(temp_df->dpmu[j]->annmr != 0) {
00720                                 if(temp_df->dpmu[j]->fmt->analog == '1') {
00721                 
00722                                         for(i = 0; i<temp_df->dpmu[j]->annmr; i++){                                     
00723                 
00724                                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->analog[i],z,4); // ANALOGS
00725                                                 z += 4;
00726                                          }
00727                                 } else {
00728         
00729                                         for(i = 0; i<temp_df->dpmu[j]->annmr; i++){                                     
00730                 
00731                                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->analog[i],z,2); // ANALOGS
00732                                                 z += 2;
00733                                          }
00734                                 }                                               
00735                         }
00736                         //Copy DIGITAL
00737                         i = 0;
00738                         if(temp_df->dpmu[j]->dgnmr != 0) {
00739                                 while(i < temp_df->dpmu[j]->dgnmr) {
00740         
00741                                                 byte_by_byte_copy(dataframe,temp_df->dpmu[j]->digital[i],z,2); // DIGITAL
00742                                                 z += 2;
00743                                                 i++;
00744                                 }                       
00745                         }       
00746                         j++;                    
00747                 } // 2 while
00748                 
00749                 temp_df = temp_df->dnext;       
00750         } // 1 while
00751         // Attach a checksum
00752 
00753         chk = compute_CRC(dataframe,z);
00754         dataframe[z++] = (chk >> 8) & ~(~0<<8);  /* CHKSUM high byte; */
00755         dataframe[z++] = (chk ) & ~(~0<<8);     /* CHKSUM low byte;  */
00756 
00757         return z;       
00758 } 
00759 
00760 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00761 /* FUNCTION  create_cfgframe():                                                 */
00762 /* It creates the IEEEC37.118 Standard based combined configuration frame from  */
00763 /* the configuration frames received from all the source devices to be sent to  */
00764 /* destination devices                                                          */
00765 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00766 
00767 int create_cfgframe() { 
00768 
00769         fprintf(fp_log,"Inside create_cfgframe()()\n");
00770         struct cfg_frame *temp_cfg;
00771         int total_frame_size = 0,count = 0;
00772         unsigned char datarate[2],soc[4],fracsec[4]; // hard coded
00773         int total_num_pmu = 0;
00774         unsigned char time_base[4];
00775         unsigned int fsize,num_pmu,phnmr,dgnmr,annmr;
00776         unsigned int data_rate,temp_data_rate;
00777         unsigned long int sec,frac = 0,temp_tb,tb;
00778         uint16_t chk;
00779 
00780         sec = (long int)time (NULL);
00781         long_int_to_ascii_convertor(sec,soc);
00782         long_int_to_ascii_convertor(frac,fracsec);
00783 
00784         temp_cfg = cfgfirst;
00785 
00786         while(temp_cfg != NULL) {
00787         
00788                  if(count == 0) { // Copy the soc,fracsec,timebase from the first CFG to the combined CFG
00789                         
00790                           //SEPARATE TIMBASE    
00791                           tb = to_long_int_convertor(temp_cfg->time_base);
00792                           copy_cbyc (time_base,temp_cfg->time_base,4);
00793 
00794                           data_rate = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->data_rate);
00795                           copy_cbyc (datarate,temp_cfg->data_rate,2);
00796 
00797                           fsize = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->framesize);
00798                           total_frame_size += fsize;
00799                           count++;                                 
00800                           // count used to count num of cfg
00801                           num_pmu = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->num_pmu); 
00802                           total_num_pmu += num_pmu;     
00803                           temp_cfg = temp_cfg->cfgnext;
00804 
00805                  } else {
00806 
00807                           fsize = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->framesize);
00808                           total_frame_size += fsize;
00809                           total_frame_size -= 24;
00810 
00811                           // take the Lowest Timebase
00812                           temp_tb = to_long_int_convertor(temp_cfg->time_base);
00813                           if(temp_tb < tb) {
00814         
00815                                 copy_cbyc (time_base,temp_cfg->time_base,4);
00816                                 tb = temp_tb;
00817                         
00818                           }
00819 
00820                           // take the highest data rate
00821                           temp_data_rate = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->data_rate);
00822                           if(temp_data_rate > data_rate) {
00823 
00824                                 copy_cbyc (datarate,temp_cfg->data_rate,2);
00825                                 data_rate = temp_data_rate;                             
00826                           }     
00827                           count++;                                 
00828                           // count used to count num of cfg
00829                           num_pmu = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->num_pmu); 
00830                           total_num_pmu += num_pmu;     
00831                           temp_cfg = temp_cfg->cfgnext;
00832                 }
00833                 
00834         } // While ENDS 
00835 
00836         cfgframe = malloc((total_frame_size + 1)*sizeof(unsigned char)); // Allocate memory for data frame
00837         cfgframe[total_frame_size] = '\0';
00838 
00839         // Start the Combined CFG frame creation 
00840         int z = 0;
00841         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,CFGSYNC,z,2); // SYNC
00842         z += 2;
00843 
00844         unsigned char temp[3];
00845         memset(temp,'\0',3);
00846         int_to_ascii_convertor(total_frame_size,temp);
00847         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp,z,2); // FRAME SIZE
00848         z += 2;
00849 
00850         memset(temp,'\0',3);
00851         int_to_ascii_convertor(PDC_IDCODE,temp);
00852         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp,z,2); // PDC ID
00853         z += 2;
00854 
00855         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,soc,z,4); //SOC
00856         z += 4;
00857         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,fracsec,z,4); //FRACSEC
00858         z += 4;
00859         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,time_base,z,4); //TIMEBASE
00860         z += 4;
00861 
00862         memset(temp,'\0',3);
00863         int_to_ascii_convertor(total_num_pmu,temp);
00864         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp,z,2); // No of PMU
00865         z += 2;
00866 
00867         int i,j; 
00868         temp_cfg = cfgfirst;
00869         while(temp_cfg != NULL) { // 1
00870 
00871                 num_pmu = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->num_pmu);   
00872                 j = 0;
00873 
00874                 while (j < num_pmu) { //2
00875 
00876                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->stn,z,16); // STN
00877                         z += 16;
00878 
00879                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->idcode,z,2); // IDCODE
00880                         z += 2;
00881 
00882                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->data_format,z,2); // FORMAT
00883                         z += 2;
00884 
00885                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->phnmr,z,2); // PHNMR
00886                         z += 2;
00887 
00888                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->annmr,z,2); // ANNMR
00889                         z += 2;
00890 
00891                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->dgnmr,z,2); // DGNMR
00892                         z += 2; 
00893 
00894                         phnmr = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->pmu[j]->phnmr);
00895                         annmr = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->pmu[j]->annmr);
00896                         dgnmr = to_intconvertor(temp_cfg->pmu[j]->dgnmr);
00897 
00898                         // Copy Phasor Names
00899                         if(phnmr != 0){
00900                         
00901                                 for(i = 0; i<phnmr;i++) {
00902 
00903                                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->cnext->phnames[i],z,16); // Phasor Names
00904                                         z += 16;                                                
00905                                 }
00906                         }
00907 
00908                         // Copy Analog Names
00909                         if(annmr != 0){
00910                         
00911                                 for(i = 0; i<annmr;i++) {
00912                 
00913                                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->cnext->angnames[i],z,16); // Analog Names
00914                                         z += 16;                                                                                        
00915                                 }
00916                         }
00917                 
00918                         // Copy Digital Names
00919                         if(dgnmr != 0) {
00920                                 
00921                                 struct dgnames *temp_dgname = temp_cfg->pmu[j]->cnext->first;
00922                                 while (temp_dgname != NULL) {
00923         
00924                                         for(i = 0;i<16;i++) {
00925 
00926                                                 byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_dgname->dgn[i],z,16); // Digital Names
00927                                                 z += 16;                                
00928                                 
00929                                         } // Copy 16 channel names of digital word      
00930 
00931                                         temp_dgname = temp_dgname->dg_next;
00932                                 } // Go to next Digital word
00933                         
00934                         }
00935 
00936                         // PHUNIT
00937                         if(phnmr != 0){
00938 
00939                                 for (i = 0; i<phnmr;i++) {
00940 
00941                                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->phunit[i],z,4); // PHUNIT
00942                                         z += 4;                                                                         
00943                                 }
00944                         }       
00945 
00946                         // ANUNIT
00947                         if(annmr != 0){
00948 
00949                                 for (i = 0; i<annmr;i++) {
00950 
00951                                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->anunit[i],z,4); // ANUNIT
00952                                         z += 4;                                                                         
00953                                         
00954                                 }
00955                         }       
00956 
00957                         // DGUNIT
00958                         if(dgnmr != 0){
00959 
00960                                 for (i = 0; i<dgnmr;i++) {
00961                                         
00962                                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->dgunit[i],z,4); // DGUNIT
00963                                         z += 4;                                                                         
00964                                 }       
00965 
00966                         }               
00967         
00968                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->fnom,z,2); // FNOM
00969                         z += 2;                                                                         
00970 
00971                         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,temp_cfg->pmu[j]->cfg_cnt,z,2); // CFGCNT
00972                         z += 2;                                                                         
00973                         
00974                         j++; // index for pmu_num
00975 
00976                 } // while 2
00977 
00978                 temp_cfg = temp_cfg->cfgnext;   // Take next CFG        
00979 
00980         } // while 1
00981         
00982 
00983         byte_by_byte_copy(cfgframe,datarate,z,2); // DATA RATE
00984         z += 2;                                                                         
00985 
00986         chk = compute_CRC(cfgframe,z);
00987         cfgframe[z++] = (chk >> 8) & ~(~0<<8);  /* CHKSUM high byte; */
00988         cfgframe[z++] = (chk ) & ~(~0<<8);      /* CHKSUM low byte;  */
00989         return z;       
00990 }
